main event: Three circular objects were observed traveling in a horizontal line, glowing but not bright, and disappeared by fading out.
interesting points: The objects were seen for 4-5 seconds, appearing the size of a full moon., The trajectory of the objects was ENE., The sighting characteristics suggest a meteor that has broken up., Witnesses noted no noise and a lack of a trail., All three objects faded out simultaneously on a 30-degree trajectory.
